nodes.bodyText: In general I think this makes sense.  It's not perfect in that the thread can be interrupted during the class load, but I don't really have any better solution for that at bootstrap (JBossThread does have support for blocking interrupts but I'm assuming that it isn't available at bootstrap).
I guess we could catch InterruptedIOException and retry if it fails?

Yeah that could work.  That exception has an int field which contains the number of bytes transferred thus far.  You'll have to clear the interrupt status manually though because InterruptedIOException (unlike InterruptedException) does not imply this.
